screen: Action: MailboxCount Synopsis: Check Mailbox Message Count Privilege: call,reporting,all Description: Checks a voicemail account for new messages. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Mailbox: Full mailbox ID <mailbox>@<vm-context> ActionID: Optional ActionID for message matching. Returns number of urgent, new and old messages. Message: Mailbox Message Count Mailbox: <mailboxid> UrgentMessages: <count> NewMessages: <count> OldMessages: <count>
